description: Manual overrides for clustering decisions. Use after reviewing clustering-audit results.

manual_merges.description: Merge these case_ids into a single case
manual_merges.reason: Same incident reported by multiple sources

manual_splits.description: Split incidents out of this case_id

notes: After adding overrides, re-run enrichment to apply changes
Use clustering-audit-YYYY.json to identify candidates for merging/splitting
